body:
Foster Learning is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV programmes, films, anime, documentaries and more – on thousands of internet-connected devices.

You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single advert – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover, and new TV programmes and films are added every week!

header: Can I try the online tool before scheduling a lesson?
body: You definitely can! Check out the online tool demo room and get familiar with all the features! In this closed test room you can get comfortable with uploading documents, writing on the whiteboard, or sharing your screen. Be sure to use the most up to date version of Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox when accessing Wyzant for the best experience.

header: How do I schedule and join my online lessons?
body: To schedule an online lesson, simply reach out to your tutor directly via your Wyzant Messages to request a time and date. Once your tutor adds the lesson to their Calendar, you will receive an email notification with a link to your online lesson.

header: How do I find a tutor?
body: You can find a tutor by searching, or can request a tutor, and Wyzant will list the tutors who best fit your personal learning goals.

Go to the Request a Tutor page. Click Get Started. Answer a few questions that will help us list qualified tutors for you. You can write an optional personal message to better explain your needs to potential tutors. We'll ask for your first name, last name, and email address so tutors can contact you. Accept our Terms of Use, and we'll post your request on our jobs board, where local tutors who teach the subject you requested will be able to apply for the job and email you directly.
